H0.text: Oil and gas produce very little power, which is the main reason they may be replaced with other sources of energy in the future.

H1.text: Oil and gas work in too few machines is the main reason oil and gas, which are two sources of energy used in America, may be replaced with other sources of energy in the future.

H2.text: Oil and gas are limited in their supplies is the main reason that oil and gas, two sources of energy used in America, may be replaced with other sources of energy in the future.

H3.text: Oil and gas are too costly to remove from the ground, which is the main reason they may be replaced with other energy sources in the future.

A4.text: Peak oil is the point when global petroleum production reaches its maximum rate, after which it will begin to decline irreversibly.

A5.text: the key issue is the economic viability of extraction at current prices.

A6.text: In some geographic localities, photovoltaic solar or onshore wind is the cheapest new-build electricity.

A7.text: Natural resources such as coal, petroleum (crude oil) and natural gas take thousands of years to form naturally and cannot be replaced as fast as they are being consumed.
